snippet: The French government sought to bolster the case for military action against Syria on Monday, releasing a declassified summary of intelligence on the use of chemical weapons.
lead_paragraph: The French government sought to bolster the case for military action against Syria on Monday, releasing a declassified summary of intelligence on the use of chemical weapons.

headline.main: French Release Intelligence Tying Assad Government to Chemical Weapons

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
